title: Stylish Hong Kong Causeway Bay Escape Overlooking the Happy Valley Racecourse
description: Escape to Crowne Plaza Hong Kong Causeway Bay, an IHG Hotel, a stylish retreat within reach of the hustle and bustle of Kowloon’s city centre. Within this contemporary hotel, feast on sumptuous global cuisines, toast to your stay at the rooftop bar or cool off in the glittering pool.
